title: Searching for the Objective in a Subjective World with Sean Carroll
description:
A few weeks ago I had the chance to sit down with theoretical physicist Sean Carroll. He was kind enough to let me pick his brain on the ways in which we understand reality from his scientific perspective. 

Listen to the Podcast here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Searching-for-the-Objective-in-a-Subjective-World-with-Sean-Carroll-efn5do

Check out his podcast where he picks the brains of other experts in a variety of fields! https://www.preposterousuniverse.com/podcast/

Follow me on twitter here: @AndreaLynnLewis
email me here: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
